comment:
* A special subclass of Intent that can have a custom label/icon
 * associated with it.  Primarily for use with {@link Intent#ACTION_CHOOSER}.

methods.name: public String getSourcePackage()
methods.comment: * Return the name of the package holding label and icon resources.

methods.name: public int getLabelResource()
methods.comment: * Return any resource identifier that has been given for the label text.

methods.name: public CharSequence getNonLocalizedLabel()
methods.comment: * Return any concrete text that has been given for the label text.

methods.name: public int getIconResource()
methods.comment: * Return any resource identifier that has been given for the label icon.

methods.name: public CharSequence loadLabel(PackageManager pm)
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the label associated with this object.  If the object does
     * not have a label, null will be returned, in which case you will probably
     * want to load the label from the underlying resolved info for the Intent.

methods.name: public Drawable loadIcon(PackageManager pm)
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the icon associated with this object.  If the object does
     * not have a icon, null will be returned, in which case you will probably
     * want to load the icon from the underlying resolved info for the Intent.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int parcelableFlags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int parcelableFlags)
